Package com.lyit.csd.domain

Class AssetQuote

java.lang.Object
com.lyit.csd.domain.AssetQuote
public class AssetQuote extends Object
The AssetQuote class used to hold pricing information of Assets, this includes. MarketPrice, MarketChangePercentage, MarketChange and MarketPreviousClose values.

      public AssetQuote(String assetSymbol)
      Type of asset quote.
      Parameters:

    • AssetQuote

      public AssetQuote(String assetSymbol, String fullExchangeName, int timeStamp, double regularMarketPrice, double regularMarketChangePercent, double regularMarketChange, String quoteType, double regularMarketPreviousClose, double regularMarketOpen)
      AssetQuote Constructor.
      Parameters:
      assetSymbol - Stock ticker of AssetQuote object
      fullExchangeName - Name of exchange
      timeStamp - Epoch timestamp representing date
      regularMarketPrice - Current market price
      regularMarketChangePercent - Change in price since market open %
      regularMarketChange - Change in market price in $
      quoteType - Type of asset
      regularMarketPreviousClose - Price of asset at previous days close
      regularMarketOpen - Price of asset at market open
